title: IoT-Based Device for Sorting Coffee Cherries by Ripeness Level
description: Designing a PCB for ESP32 using the EasyEDA website, programming it in C with Arduino IDE software, and creating an interface using the Blynk website.

title: Design and Construction of an Electrocardiogram Calibrator
description: Making a PCB for the resistor network within the system. This system uses an ESP32-2432S028R as its microcontroller and a Wintonic 18650 Li-Ion battery, connected to a step-up battery charger, as its power supply.

title: Design and Construction of a 3-Axis ASRS for Electronic Components in the Analog Laboratory of Politeknik Negeri Semarang
description: ASRS Electronic Components is an automated storage and retrieval system that uses servos as its actuators. This device has 2 servos for the X and Y axes, and a stepper motor for the Z axis. The X axis moves left and right, the Y axis moves up and down, the Z axis moves forward and backward, and it uses a PLC as its controller.
